xwikidoc.name: XCSTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: XCS Translations
xwikidoc.content:
xcs.footer.version=XWiki Collaboration Suite 2016 ({0}) - By {1}XWiki SAS{2} xcs.footer.webcopyright=This wiki is licensed under a {0}Creative Commons 2.0{1} license
xcs.tour.main.stepWelcome.title=Welcome to XCS xcs.tour.main.stepWelcome.content1=In the next couple of minutes we will navigate together, discovering your wiki's functionality and performing basic actions. xcs.tour.main.stepWelcome.content2=This is the main Home for your wikis.
xcs.tour.main.stepHeader.title=Wiki Header xcs.tour.main.stepHeader.content1=This allow access to your User Profile, Watchlist activators and Search. xcs.tour.main.stepHeader.content2=The drawer contains wiki related actions, like Administration.
xcs.tour.main.stepPageMenu.title=Page Menu xcs.tour.main.stepPageMenu.content1=This menu contains page related actions, allowing users with appropriate rights to create, edit, delete pages. xcs.tour.main.stepPageMenu.content2=More actions are available like Export, Print, Share, etc...
xcs.tour.main.stepWelcomeMessage.title=Welcome message xcs.tour.main.stepWelcomeMessage.content1=The Welcome message is used to display important messages. xcs.tour.main.stepWelcomeMessage.content2=As Administrator, you can change this message and any other Dashboard gadgets displayed.
xcs.tour.main.stepWikis.title=Wikis xcs.tour.main.stepWikis.content1=This the list of available wikis. As Administrator you can create new wikis to match your needs. xcs.tour.main.stepWikis.content2=Click on a Wiki to learn more about its particularities.
